    • Method Detail

      • generateCreateTableDDL

        public static String generateCreateTableDDL(Schema schema,
                                            String tblName,
                                            String tblLocation,
                                            Optional<String> optionalDbName,
                                            Optional<Map<String,String>> optionalPartitionDDLInfo,
                                            Optional<List<String>> optionalClusterInfo,
                                            Optional<Map<String,HiveAvroORCQueryGenerator.COLUMN_SORT_ORDER>> optionalSortOrderInfo,
                                            Optional<Integer> optionalNumOfBuckets,
                                            Optional<String> optionalRowFormatSerde,
                                            Optional<String> optionalInputFormat,
                                            Optional<String> optionalOutputFormat,
                                            Properties tableProperties,
                                            boolean isEvolutionEnabled,
                                            Optional<Table> destinationTableMeta,
                                            Map<String,String> hiveColumns)
        Generate DDL query to create a different format (default: ORC) Hive table for a given Avro Schema
        Parameters:
        schema - Avro schema to use to generate the DDL for new Hive table
        tblName - New Hive table name
        tblLocation - New hive table location
        optionalDbName - Optional DB name, if not specified it defaults to 'default'
        optionalPartitionDDLInfo - Optional partition info in form of map of partition key, partition type pair If not specified, the table is assumed to be un-partitioned ie of type snapshot
        optionalClusterInfo - Optional cluster info
        optionalSortOrderInfo - Optional sort order
        optionalNumOfBuckets - Optional number of buckets
        optionalRowFormatSerde - Optional row format serde, default is ORC
        optionalInputFormat - Optional input format serde, default is ORC
        optionalOutputFormat - Optional output format serde, default is ORC
        tableProperties - Optional table properties
        isEvolutionEnabled - If schema evolution is turned on
        destinationTableMeta - Optional destination table metadata @return Generated DDL query to create new Hive table

      • generateCreatePartitionDDL

        public static List<String> generateCreatePartitionDDL(String dbName,
                                                      String tableName,
                                                      String partitionLocation,
                                                      Map<String,String> partitionsDMLInfo,
                                                      Optional<String> format)
        Generate DDL query to create a Hive partition pointing at specific location.
        Parameters:
        dbName - Hive database name.
        tableName - Hive table name.
        partitionLocation - Physical location of partition.
        partitionsDMLInfo - Partitions DML info - a map of partition name and partition value.
        format - Hive partition file format
        Returns:
        Commands to create a partition.

                                                      String partitionLocation,
                                                      Map<String,String> partitionsDMLInfo)

      • generateDropTableDDL

        public static String generateDropTableDDL(String dbName,
                                          String tableName)
        Generate DDL query to drop a Hive table.
        Parameters:
        dbName - Hive database name.
        tableName - Hive table name.
        Returns:
        Command to drop the table.

      • escapeHiveType

        Escape the Hive nested field names.
        Parameters:
        type - Primitive or nested Hive type.
        Returns:
        Escaped Hive nested field.

      • generateTableMappingDML

        public static String generateTableMappingDML(Schema inputAvroSchema,
                                             Schema outputOrcSchema,
                                             String inputTblName,
                                             String outputTblName,
                                             Optional<String> optionalInputDbName,
                                             Optional<String> optionalOutputDbName,
                                             Optional<Map<String,String>> optionalPartitionDMLInfo,
                                             Optional<Boolean> optionalOverwriteTable,
                                             Optional<Boolean> optionalCreateIfNotExists,
                                             boolean isEvolutionEnabled,
                                             Optional<Table> destinationTableMeta,
                                             Optional<Integer> rowLimit)
        Generate DML mapping query to populate output schema table by selecting from input schema table This method assumes that each output schema field has a corresponding source input table's field reference .. in form of 'flatten_source' property
        Parameters:
        inputAvroSchema - Input schema that was used to obtain output schema (next argument)
        outputOrcSchema - Output schema (flattened or nested) that was generated using input schema .. and has lineage information compatible with input schema
        inputTblName - Input table name
        outputTblName - Output table name
        optionalInputDbName - Optional input DB name, if not specified it will default to 'default'
        optionalOutputDbName - Optional output DB name, if not specified it will default to 'default'
        optionalPartitionDMLInfo - Optional partition info in form of map of partition key, partition value pairs
        optionalOverwriteTable - Optional overwrite table, if not specified it is set to true
        optionalCreateIfNotExists - Optional create if not exists, if not specified it is set to false
        isEvolutionEnabled - If schema evolution is turned on
        destinationTableMeta - Optional destination table metadata
        rowLimit - Optional row limit
        Returns:
        DML query

      • readSchemaFromString

                                   throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • generateEvolutionDDL

        public static List<String> generateEvolutionDDL(String stagingTableName,
                                                String finalTableName,
                                                Optional<String> optionalStagingDbName,
                                                Optional<String> optionalFinalDbName,
                                                Schema evolvedSchema,
                                                boolean isEvolutionEnabled,
                                                Map<String,String> evolvedColumns,
                                                Optional<Table> destinationTableMeta)
        Generate DDLs to evolve final destination table.
        Parameters:
        stagingTableName - Staging table.
        finalTableName - Un-evolved final destination table.
        optionalStagingDbName - Optional staging database name, defaults to default.
        optionalFinalDbName - Optional final database name, defaults to default.
        evolvedSchema - Evolved Avro Schema.
        isEvolutionEnabled - Is schema evolution enabled.
        evolvedColumns - Evolved columns in Hive format.
        destinationTableMeta - Destination table metadata.
        Returns:
        DDLs to evolve final destination table.

      • generateDropPartitionsDDL

        public static List<String> generateDropPartitionsDDL(String dbName,
                                                     String finalTableName,
                                                     Map<String,String> partitionsDMLInfo)
        Generate DDL for dropping partitions of a table.

        ALTER TABLE finalTableName DROP IF EXISTS PARTITION partition_spec, PARTITION partition_spec, ...;

        Parameters:
        finalTableName - Table name where partitions are dropped
        partitionsDMLInfo - Partitions to be dropped
        Returns:
        DDL to drop partitions in finalTableName

      • generateDropPartitionsDDL

        public static List<String> generateDropPartitionsDDL(String dbName,
                                                     String finalTableName,
                                                     List<Map<String,String>> partitionDMLInfos)
        Generate DDL for dropping partitions of a table.

        ALTER TABLE finalTableName DROP IF EXISTS PARTITION partition_spec, PARTITION partition_spec, ...;

        Parameters:
        finalTableName - Table name where partitions are dropped
        partitionDMLInfos - list of Partition to be dropped
        Returns:
        DDL to drop partitions in finalTableName

      • generateCreateOrUpdateViewDDL

        public static List<String> generateCreateOrUpdateViewDDL(String tableDbName,
                                                         String tableName,
                                                         String viewDbName,
                                                         String viewName,
                                                         boolean shouldUpdateView)
        Generate DDL for creating and updating view over a table. Create view:

        CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS db.viewName AS SELECT * FROM db.tableName

        Update view:

        ALTER VIEW db.viewName AS SELECT * FROM db.tableName

        Parameters:
        tableDbName - Database for the table over which view has to be created.
        tableName - Table over which view has to be created.
        viewDbName - Database for the view to be created.
        viewName - View to be created.
        shouldUpdateView - If view should be forced re-built.
        Returns:
        DDLs to create and / or update view over a table

      • generateAlterTableOrPartitionStorageFormatDDL

        public static List<String> generateAlterTableOrPartitionStorageFormatDDL(String dbName,
                                                                         String tableName,
                                                                         Optional<Map<String,String>> partitionsDMLInfo,
                                                                         String format)
        Generate DDL for updating file format of table or partition. If partition spec is absent, DDL query to change storage format of Table is generated. Query syntax:

        ALTER TABLE tableName [PARTITION partition_spec] SET FILEFORMAT fileFormat

        Parameters:
        dbName - Database for the table for which storage format needs to be changed.
        tableName - Table for which storage format needs to be changed.
        partitionsDMLInfo - Optional partition spec for which storage format needs to be changed.
        format - Storage format.
        Returns:
        DDL to change storage format for Table or Partition.

      • serializePublishCommands

        public static void serializePublishCommands(State state,
                                            QueryBasedHivePublishEntity queryBasedHivePublishEntity)
        Serialize a QueryBasedHivePublishEntity into a State at SERIALIZED_PUBLISH_TABLE_COMMANDS.
        Parameters:
        state - State to serialize entity into.
        queryBasedHivePublishEntity - to carry to publisher.

      • deserializePublishCommands

        public static QueryBasedHivePublishEntity deserializePublishCommands(State state)
        Deserialize the publish entity from a State at SERIALIZED_PUBLISH_TABLE_COMMANDS.
        Parameters:
        state - State to look into for serialized entity.
        Returns:
        Publish table entity.
